thread.title: Secret archive offers fresh insight into Nixon presidency
thread.title_full: Secret archive offers fresh insight into Nixon presidency - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Secret archive offers fresh insight into Nixon presidency
text: President Richard Nixon believed that years of aerial bombing in Southeast Asia to pressure North Vietnam achieved “zilch” even as he publicly declared it was effective and ordered more bombing while running for reelection in 1972, according to a handwritten note from Nixon disclosed in a new book by Bob Woodward. Nixon’s note to Henry […] ...
